ai-patthana24.21:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of all that had been made.
ai-patthana24.21:0.3_0: Transmigrating for the sake of adornments and so on,
ai-patthana24.21:1.1_0: You don’t give rise to the thought for refuge. Consciousness arises dependent on the Teaching.
ai-patthana24.21:2.1_0: go for refuge to the teaching, or to the object.
ai-patthana24.21:2.1_1: One does not give rise to a thought that has no footing. Experiencing causes dependent on the head,
ai-patthana24.21:2.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana24.21:2.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.21:3.1_0: or mind is not the cause,
ai-patthana24.21:3.1_1: or thought: the mind is not the cause, for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana24.21:3.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.21:4.1_0: or mental causes and conditions for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.21:4.1_1: or mental conduct arise dependent on a principle beset by conflict.
ai-patthana24.21:4.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.21:5.1_0: or a go for refuge to the mind.
ai-patthana24.21:5.1_1: or mind associated with mental conduct.
ai-patthana24.21:5.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.21:6.1_0: mind is not the cause of refuge for the mind, nor for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.21:6.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
